resources.string: NeuroSurvey
No
Not sure
1. Have you had any type of facial pain since your last operation?
10. Have you taken any medication for the facial pain since the last operation?
11. Roughly how often in the past month have you been taking medication?
12. What drugs are you taking, and how many tablets a day?
13a. If you had numbness before this operation has it changed as a result of this operation?
13b. Following the operation, does any part of your face feel numb that was not numb before?
14. How soon after the operation did the numbness begin?
15. How severe is the numbness (compared to stages of a dental injection wearing off)?
16. How painful is it to touch this area of numbness?
17. What degree of burning or other altered sensation do you have on the same side of your face as the operation site?
18. Did the operation result in any hearing loss?
19.Has the hearing loss changed in any way?
20. Do you feel unsteady on your feet as a result of the operation?
21. Do you suffer from more dizziness than usual following this operation?
22. Do you suffer from more headaches than usual following this operation?
23. Following the operation do you have any difficulty with eating that you didn’t have before?
24. Have you got any problems with your vision that you didn’t have before this operation? (please tick all that apply)
25. Have you got any other complications that we have not mentioned? If yes, please list.
26. Please state how the complications (from questions 13–25) currently affect the quality of your life, if at all:
27. Looking back now, how would you consider the timing of your surgery?
28. Overall how satisfied are you with your current situation in comparison to before the operation?
29. In the last month have you felt a lack of pleasure in life?
2a. Does the pain you have now, feel the same as it did before your operation?
2b. Indicate how it is different.
3. Following your most recent operation, when did you first experience the pain?
30. In the last month have you felt depressed?
31. Have you had any treatments other than medications for your trigeminal neuralgia in the past year? Please give details if yes.
4. Is the pain continuous?
5. How long does a single incident of pain last?
6. How long do you usually go without any episodes of pain?
7. How intense does the pain feel?
8. Where is the pain?
9. Do any of these activities set the pain off?
Yes
